sentences.sentence: "My mum said there have been more murders here recently," she explains confidingly.
sentences.translation: “我妈妈说最近发生好多谋杀案件，”她一本正经地向我解释。

sentences.sentence: Their hands were laid confidingly in the hand of Christ; their feet were planted upon the Rock of Ages.
sentences.translation: 他们以信心的手握住基督的手；他们的脚在“万古的磐石”上也立稳了。
